subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Carl Edwards raced to his second victory in six days, holding off Dale Earnhardt Jr. on two late restarts Sunday to win the U.A.W.-Dodge 400 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
snippet: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Carl Edwards raced to his second victory in six days, holding off Dale Earnhardt Jr. on two late restarts Sunday to win the U.A.W.-Dodge 400 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
